products.name: Titrator
products.tagline: Since the 18th century, titration has been recognized as a cornerstone analytical method, originally requiring careful manual handling and strict oper...
products.overview: Since the 18th century, titration has been recognized as a cornerstone analytical method, originally requiring careful manual handling and strict operator expertise. With the advancement of automation, titration systems have evolved into highly sophisticated instruments capable of executing multi-parameter, multi-step titrations with unparalleled accuracy. The Titrator 1 – Model AT-TIT-712 takes this evolution further by fusing classical methodology with forward-looking digital automation. Its design significantly reduces manual input, minimizes human error, and enhances laboratory throughput while maintaining uncompromising accuracy and repeatability. By doing so, it not only preserves the integrity of traditional titration principles but also builds upon them with smart technology, flexible programming, and powerful analytical integration.

products.name: UV-Visible Spectrophotometer
products.tagline: UV-Visible spectrophotometry is a fundamental analytical technique widely used for quantitative and qualitative assessment of chemical and biological ...
products.overview: UV-Visible spectrophotometry is a fundamental analytical technique widely used for quantitative and qualitative assessment of chemical and biological samples. The UV-Visible Spectrophotometer by Ativeer Solutions integrates high-performance optics with a stable monochromator system and sensitive photodetectors, delivering reliable readings from 190 nm to 1100 nm. This broad wavelength range accommodates diverse assays including nucleic acid, protein quantitation, enzyme kinetics, and concentration measurements of colored compounds.
